name: focus-dial-root
description: Root package for Focus Dial project, managing firmware and web app.

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev --prefix time-tracking-app/backend" "npm run dev --prefix time-tracking-app/frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix time-tracking-app/backend && npm install --prefix time-tracking-app/frontend
scripts.start:prod: npm run build:frontend && npm start --prefix time-tracking-app/backend
